name: Brain Crush
description: Brain Crush is a mind, “strategy”, and fast thinking game in a world of 2D. Basically, the biggest goal of the game is to reach a blue portal looking a lot like the main character. The game might improve your real life reflexes and logic thinking as well. Jo tak!
minimum_requirements: Storage: 9 MB available space Additional Notes: Brain Crush most likely supports all Windows versions, though it has only been tested with Windows 7, 8, and 10.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Storage: 20 MB available space
